name: MEC Timeless Pants - Women's
description:
Anywhere, anything, anytime. These pants are the pinnacle of versatility – wear them on your bike ride to work, to your 2pm meeting, and straight to the international departures gate.Slim fit with a taper blends a flattering streamlined silhouette with comfort.Lightweight recycled polyester, spandex blend has an effortless stretch, feels cool against the skin, packs well and dries quickly.DWR finish keeps them looking great and sheds light rain.UPF 50+ helps protect from harsh UV.Supple elastic waistband offers all-day comfort.Dual hand pockets and a hidden zippered pocket give you lots of room for small necessities.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
